school_name: Florida State University College of Law
tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA
comments: I took this class to counter my 1L Contracts experience. Benham emphasizes transaction contracts, so I was concerned about my lack of a business background. Nonetheless, his knowledge, clear communication, engaging lectures, and thorough feedback made this class very beneficial. I highly recommend him. And I\'m no longer terrified of contracts.

comments: I had him for contract drafting. It\'s his first time teaching and it shows. I would NOT recommend him, unless you have to. Dull powerpoints, weird grading.
